name: Dot Color Drop - Train your reflex with this droppy balls matching game
name_original: Dot Color Drop - Train your reflex with this droppy balls matching game
description:
Addicting game. Move the tiles left and right to match its color with the falling dots. Score earned when the color matched. This game trains your reflex as the dots falling down.

Very easy game and small size, download it now and play when you have free time.
